List all kde qbus shortcutshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/list-all-kde-qbus-shortcuts/Fri, 06 Jul 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/list-all-kde-qbus-shortcuts/List all: qdbus org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/kwin org.kde.kglobalaccel.Component.shortcutNames Execute: qdbus org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/kwin org.kde.kglobalaccel.Component.invokeShortcut shortcutName
KDE kwin with nvidia drivers crashes on switching desktopshttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-kwin-with-nvidia-drivers-crashes-on-switching-desktops/Sun, 10 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-kwin-with-nvidia-drivers-crashes-on-switching-desktops/Try disabling Desktop Switch On-Screen Display in KDE settings (Desktop Behavior > Virtual Desktops > Switching)
KDE mouse acceleration too fasthttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-mouse-acceleration-too-fast/Thu, 19 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/kde-mouse-acceleration-too-fast/KDE setttings doesn’t affect mouse acceleration, so we use xinput. Get the mouse id: xinput list Get all the props for the mouse: xinput list-props 14 Set the acceleration property. Value may need to be adjusted. xinput set-prop 14 669 -1 From: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/90572/how-can-i-set-mouse-sensitivity-not-just-mouse-acceleration
The QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME environment variable is not set correctlyhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/the-qt_qpa_platformtheme-environment-variable-is-not-set-correctly/Fri, 01 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/the-qt_qpa_platformtheme-environment-variable-is-not-set-correctly/Set environment variable in /etc/environment and add the following line: QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME=qt5ct Restart the system From https://github.com/SwagArch/swagarch-build/issues/6
Disable KDE5 baloo file indexer and delete search datahttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/disable-kde5-baloo-file-indexer-and-delete-search-data/Thu, 31 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/disable-kde5-baloo-file-indexer-and-delete-search-data/Check status: balooctl status Disable: balooctl disable Delete data: rm -rf ~/.local/share/baloo
Can't change desktop layout in kdehttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/cant-change-desktop-layout-in-kde/Fri, 04 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/cant-change-desktop-layout-in-kde/You locked the widgets, stupid.
Restart the plasmashell in KDE 5http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/restart-the-plasmashell-in-kde-5/Mon, 19 Jun 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/restart-the-plasmashell-in-kde-5/Alt + F2 and …. killall plasmashell kstart plasmashell
Use xbindkeys to change KDE 5 virtual desktophttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/use-xbindkeys-to-change-kde-virtual-desktop/Mon, 10 Apr 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/use-xbindkeys-to-change-kde-virtual-desktop/Content of .xbindkeysrc for use with my M570 trackball… "qdbus org.kde.KWin /KWin org.kde.KWin.previousDesktop" b:8 "qdbus org.kde.KWin /KWin org.kde.KWin.nextDesktop" b:9 Using xte commands is also an option… "xte 'keydown Alt_L' 'key Left' 'keyup Alt_L'" b:8
Temporarily remove kde drop shadowhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/temporarily-remove-kde-drop-shadow/Sun, 20 Nov 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/temporarily-remove-kde-drop-shadow/Enter the following. Cursor turns to a cross hair. Click the desired panel or window. xprop -remove _KDE_NET_WM_SHADOW
Rebuild kde5 application menuhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/rebuild-kde5-application-menu/Tue, 12 Jul 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/rebuild-kde5-application-menu/Sometimes KDE likes to remember apps that have been moved or removed. Run this to refresh: kbuildsycoca5
Konqueror abd cervisia: this is not a cvs folderhttp://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/konqueror-abd-cervisia-this-is-not-a-cvs-folder/Mon, 14 Sep 2015 00:00:00 +0000http://www.jeffsmithdev.com/notes/konqueror-abd-cervisia-this-is-not-a-cvs-folder/From Konqueror, remove Cervisia from: Settings > Configure Konqueror > File Associations > inode > directory From https://forums.gentoo.org/viewtopic-t-456945-start-0.html
